```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(CausalImpact)
library(janitor)
library(zoo)
```

```{r}
here::i_am("index.qmd")
```

```{r}
stays <- read_csv2("data.csv", locale = locale(encoding = "latin1")) |> 
  clean_names() |> 
  dplyr::select(3)
```

```{r}
stays_ts <- zoo(stays)
```

```{r}
pre_period <- c(1, 446)
post_period <- c(447, 616)

impact <- CausalImpact(stays_ts, pre_period, post_period)

plot(impact)
```

```{r}
summary(impact)
```

```{r}
summary(impact, "report")
```
